title: Team Adaptability
content: Resilient teams adapt to unexpected conditions without breaking. They recognize when standard approaches aren't working, generate alternatives, and implement changes quickly. Adaptability requires both capability (skills, resources) and willingness (mindset, permission).

mcq.question: A team's standard procedure isn't working in an unusual situation. What should happen?

options.A: Follow the procedureâ€”it exists for a reason
options.B: Recognize the mismatch and adapt approach while maintaining safety

mcq.explanation: Procedures assume normal conditions. When conditions are abnormal, rigid adherence can cause harm. Adaptation within safety boundaries is appropriate. The skill is recognizing when adaptation is needed and executing it safely.

openQuestions: How does your team recognize when standard approaches aren't working?
What enables or prevents adaptation in your environment?
